sentences.english: The party was established to represent the interests of workers and trade unionists.
sentences.chinese: 工党的成立宗旨是代表工人阶级和行业工会的利益。

sentences.english: The working class represents the CPC's strongest and most reliable class foundation.
sentences.chinese: 我国工人阶级是我们党最坚实最可靠的阶级基础。

sentences.english: The ally of the working class was the peasantry.
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级的同盟军是农民阶级。

sentences.english: Yet, the working class did not secure their rights after 1848.
sentences.chinese: 1848年后，工人阶级依然无法保证自己的权利。

sentences.english: The working class did not expect miracles from the Commune.
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级并没有期望公社做出奇迹。

sentences.english: Any changes in the working class will directly affect the political feature of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级的任何变化，都会直接改变党的政治面貌。

sentences.english: Universal suffrage is thus the gauge of the maturity of the working class.
sentences.chinese: 因此，普选制是测量工人阶级成熟性的标尺。

sentences.english: According to Marxist thought being of the property-owning class and exploitive of the working class .
sentences.chinese: 属于拥有财产的阶级而且剥削工人阶级。

sentences.english: It is the working class that is most selfless.
It was in effect a lulling of working class demands.
sentences.chinese: 这是安抚工人阶级要求的有效方法。

sentences.english: People's democratic dictatorship needs the leadership of the working class.
sentences.chinese: 人民民主专政需要工人阶级的领导。

sentences.english: First, working class party in power must coordinate relationship with masses.
sentences.chinese: 第一，工人阶级执政党必须处理好与人民群众的关系。

sentences.english: who would be typically working class on a low income.
sentences.chinese: 他们是典型低收入的工人阶级。

sentences.english: He did not need an urban proletariat; his revolution had already taken place.
sentences.chinese: 他并不需要城市工人阶级，他的革命已经开始了。

sentences.english: The state wasted no time in preventing the emergence of full-out working class revolutions.
sentences.chinese: 这些国家立刻制止全面出现的工人阶级革命。

sentences.english: With my working-class background I feel like a fish out of water among these people.
sentences.chinese: 我出身于工人阶级，在这些人中感到很不自在。

pinyin: guo2 jia1 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
